articles.title: Kim Jong Il visits chicken farm
South Korean workers' rally held
Amendment of "Law on Public Workers" urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Pyongyang, November 11 (KCNA) -- The preparatory committee for the public workers union in South Korea launched a signature campaign demanding the amendment of the "Law on Public Workers," according to MBC in Seoul.
 Disclosing the unreasonableness of the present unequal "law," the organization declared it would conduct a signature campaign demanding the amendment of this law among public workers and citizens.
